suite.name: Trivago Discover

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Given user is on Trivago Discover page
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

arguments.arg: Top deals on hotels and other stays

kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Top deals on hotels and other stays'.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And user sees Top deals on hotels and other stays
Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Button
kw.doc: Verifies button ``locator`` is found from current page.

  }/* main container */
#onetrust-banner-sdk .ot-sdk-row {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-direction: column;
}

/* container paddings */
#onetrust-banner-sdk .ot-sdk-container {
    padding: 16px;
    width: 100% !important;
}

/* banner text */
#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-group-container {
    flex: 1 1 auto;
    padding-bottom: 0;
    margin: 0;
    width: 100%;
}

/* text containers alignment and styling */
#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-policy,
#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-policy-text {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 12px;
    line-height: 1.2;
}

#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-policy-text a {
    display: none;
}

/* button group container */
#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-button-group-parent {
    flex: 0 0 auto;
    position: static !important;
    width: auto !important;
    transform: none !important;
    margin: 0;
}

/* button group */
#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-button-group {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: no-wrap;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-direction: row;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    margin: 16px 0 0;
}

/* hide close button */
#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-close-btn-container {
    display: none;
}

/* button and link reset */
#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-accept-btn-handler,
#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-btn-handler.cookie-setting-link {
    margin: 0 8px !important;
    padding: 12px 16px;
    width: auto;
    min-width: 0;
}

/* Settings link style */
#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-btn-handler.cookie-setting-link {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #007fad;
}

#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-btn-handler.cookie-setting-link:focus,
#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-btn-handler.cookie-setting-link:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
    color: #007fad;
    opacity: 1;
}

/* Accept button style */
#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-accept-btn-handler:focus,
#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-accept-btn-handler:hover {
    background-color: #37454d;
    opacity: 1;
}

/* horizontal layout */
@media  (min-width: 768px) {
  #onetrust-banner-sdk .ot-sdk-row {
    flex-direction: row;
  }
  
  #onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-button-group {
    flex-wrap: no-wrap;
    margin: 0 0 0 16px;
  }

            /* Policy descriptions */
#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk #pc-policy-text {
    font-size: 12px;
}

/* More info link */
#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk .privacy-notice-link {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #007fad;
}

#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk .privacy-notice-link:hover,
#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk .privacy-notice-link:focus {
    text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Always active cookie category */
#onetrust-pc-sdk #cookie-preferences .ot-always-active {
    color: #007fad;
}

/* Accept button */
#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk .button-theme, 
#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk button){
    background-color: #697379 !important;
    border-color: #697379 !important;
}

#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk .button-theme:hover,
#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk .button-theme:focus {
    background-color: #37454d !important;
    border-color: #37454d !important;
    opacity: 1;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk .save-preference-btn-handler {
    max-width: 100%;
    margin-top: 0;
}

/* Toggle switch */
#onetrust-pc-sdk .accordion-text .ot-switch {
    width: 30px;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk .accordion-text .ot-switch-label {
    border: 0;
    border-radius: 2px;
    background-color: #9ba2a6;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk .switch-checkbox:checked+.ot-switch-label {
    border: 0;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-switch-inner:before {
    height: 18px;
    background-color: #007fad;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk .accordion-text.category-item .ot-switch-nob {
    background-color: #ffffff;
    border: 0;
    border-radius: 2px;
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
    right: 12px;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk .switch-checkbox:checked+.ot-switch-label .ot-switch-nob {
    background-color: #ffffff;
}

/* Container */
#onetrust-pc-sdk #ot-content {
    position: static;
    margin-top: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    max-height: 80vh;
}

/* Dialog wrapper */
#onetrust-pc-sdk.otPcCenter {
    bottom: auto;
    max-width: 720px;
}

/* Close icon */
#onetrust-pc-sdk #close-pc-btn-handler.ot-close-icon, 
#onetrust-pc-sdk #vendor-close-pc-btn-handler.ot-close-icon {
    background-color: #ffffff;
    top: 20px;
    right: 23px;
}

#onetrust-pc-sdk #close-pc-btn-handler.ot-close-icon:hover, 
#onetrust-pc-sdk #vendor-close-pc-btn-handler.ot-close-icon:hover {
    opacity: 1;
}

/* Wider layout */
@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
    #onetrust-pc-sdk #cookie-preferences {
        margin-bottom: 32px;
    }

    #onetrust-pc-sdk #ot-content {
        max-height: 95vh;
    }

    #onetrust-pc-sdk #close-pc-btn-handler.ot-close-icon, 
    #onetrust-pc-sdk #vendor-close-pc-btn-handler.ot-close-icon {
        top: 0;
        right: 0;
        width: 48px;
        height: 48px;
    }

    #onetrust-banner-sdk .ot-close-icon, 
    #onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-close-icon {
        background-image: none;
    }

    #onetrust-banner-sdk .ot-close-icon::after, 
    #onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-close-icon::after {
        background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,");
        content: "";
        width: 12px;
        height: 12px;
        display: block;
        position: absolute;
        background-size: contain;
        right: 24px;
        top: 16px;
    }
